parameter.name: loadEventDB
parameter.description: Number of days of events to pre-load when application is started.

parameter.name: names
parameter.description: Defines a list of tilemap's names.

parameter.name: paths
parameter.description: Defines the paths binded with the maps tiles. Tiles folders/files have to be sensitive to this formulation: maps_directory/%zoom%/osm_%zoom%_%column%_%tile%.png. Several tiles maps can be added regarding right association of paths and names.

parameter.name: defaultLatitude
parameter.description: Sets the default map latitude in decimal degrees.

parameter.name: defaultLongitude
parameter.description: Sets the default map longitude in decimal degrees.

parameter.name: depth
parameter.description: Defines the number of decimals that should be visible for depth values.

parameter.name: distance
parameter.description: Defines the number of decimals that should be visible for distance values.

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: Defines the number of decimals that should be visible for location values.

parameter.name: rms
parameter.description: Defines the number of decimals that should be visible for R.M.S. values.

parameter.name: azimuth
parameter.description: Defines the number of decimals that should be visible for azimuth values.

parameter.name: pickTime
parameter.description: Defines the number of decimals that should be visible for pickTime values.

parameter.name: distanceinKM
parameter.description: Defines the unit in which distance are displayed.

parameter.name: base
parameter.description: Defines the base font family to use.

parameter.name: normal
parameter.description: Defines the base font family size to use.

parameter.name: styleSheet
parameter.description: Defines the stylesheet (CSS) to use for GUI customization.

group.name: quakeml
group.description: scbev uses 'xalan' binary to convert back SC3ML origins into QuakeML origins.

parameter.name: schemaFile
parameter.description: Defines the filepath of the QuakeML schema reference.

parameter.name: instituteName
parameter.description: This is the agencyID who will be printed on GSE and IMS bulletins.

parameter.name: instituteTag
parameter.description: This is the method used to associate an event to its arrivals (between hypocenters file and picks file)

parameter.name: author
parameter.description: This is the authorID who will be printed on GSE and IMS bulletins.

parameter.name: showNotExistingOrigins
parameter.description: Sets whether or not origins flagged with "NOT EXISTING" have type to be seen in the list.

parameter.name: showNotLocatableOrigin
parameter.description: Sets whether or not origins flagged with "NOT LOCATABLE" type have to be seen in the list.

parameter.name: showOriginsWithNoType
parameter.description: Sets whether or not origins without a type have to be seen in the list.

parameter.name: showOutOfNetworkInterestsOrigins
parameter.description: Sets whether or not origins flagged with "OUTSIDE OF NETWORK INTEREST" type have to be seen in the list.

parameter.name: locators
parameter.description: Defines a list of locators that will be available as filters.

struct.description: Defines a list of profiles belonging to a locator.

parameter.name: useSeparateThread
parameter.description: Sets whether or not objects (events) should be fetched by using another thread than the GUI's one.

parameter.name: useCacheEngine
parameter.description: Sets whether or not objects (events) should be fetched and stored inside a cache.
